Reviews.Title: One very rugged camera so far...
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Wong
Reviews.Content: This was great deal.  Got a memory card and lot's of extras.  Camera has many options and so far is water proof as advertised!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 11 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Olympus Tough TG-2 iHS Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Red) + <2> PD-DCM Compact Camera Case +
<3> Transcend 16GB Class 4 SD Card + <4> Spare Li-90B Battery + <5> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod +
<6> Floating Foam Camera Strap + <7> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<9> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <10> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus Tough TG-2 iHS Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Red) with 16GB Card + Case + Battery + Flex Tripod + Accessory Kit
